Text: Fwd FW To My Dear Wife Inline attachment follows From To McAfee Larry Creasman Scott Arthur Carpentier Email Dwayne Hyzak Email David Zaozirny Email Jeff Sproull Email Wade Sanders Email Date Thursday October GMT Subject To My Dear Wife During the past year I have tried to make love to you times I have succeeded times which is an average of once every ten days The following is a list of why I did not succeed more often times the sheets were clean times it was too late times you were too tired times it was too hot times you pretended to be asleep times you had a headache times you were afraid of waking the baby times you said you were too sore times it was the wrong time of the month times you had to get up early times you said werent in the mood times you were sunburned times you were watching the late show times you didnt want to mess up your new hairdo times you said the neighbors would hear us times you said your mother would hear us Of the times I did succeed the activity was not satisfactory because times you just laid there times you reminded me theres a crack in the ceiling times you told me to hurry up and get it over with times I had to wake you and tell you I finished time I was afraid I had hurt you because I felt you move To My Dear Husband I think you have things a little confused Here are the reasons you didnt get more than you did times you came home drunk and tried to screw the cat times you did not come home at all times you didnt cum times you came too soon times you went soft before you got in times you worked too late times you got cramps in your toes times you had to get up early to play golf times you were in a fight and someone kicked you in the balls times you got it stuck in your zipper times you had a cold and your nose was running times you had a splinter in your finger times you lost the notion after thinking about it all day times you came in your pajamas while reading a dirty book times you were too busy watching football baseball etc on TV Of the times we did get together The reason I laid still was because you missed and were screwing the sheets I wasnt talking about the crack in the ceiling what I said was Would you prefer me on my back or kneeling The time you felt me move was because you farted and I was trying to breathe Once you read this letter you have to keep it going This game has been played since You must send this letter to people On the th day someone will ask you out or say I love you This is not a joke It has worked for many years If you break the chain you will have bad luck with guysgirls forever This is just for future readers This began in not much of a past but it works So here are the rules If you read this on a Sunday wish for a really fun week If you read this on a Monday wish for money If you read this on a Tuesday wish for love If you read this on a Wednesday wish for success If you read this on a Thursday wish for anything you want If you read this on a Friday wish for a really hot date If you read this on a Saturday wish for an important phone call Send this to seven people after you make a wish Make sure it is sent as soon as you read it or your wish wont come true
Ski TripHi Mark How was your trip this weekend Happy Anniversary Did you get a chance to check into the Montaneros Lodge What did you think Thanks Elaine
